response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product not only represents years of innovation and dedication but also offers unparalleled benefits that can significantly enhance your experience or business operations. Given its unique features and the quality it embodies, we believe its true value surpasses $8,000. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $9,500. This is an opportunity to acquire a product that could potentially be a game-changer for you, and I am confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making a decision.", "product_price": 9500}
